Name: Epestone Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A pleasant, maroon coloured, blackcurrant-flavoured Daiquiri.
Nutrition: One serving of Epestone Daiquiri contains 152 calories
